short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: for Chrome™ Live Extension Reloading Client. Lets you use Live Reload for your Chrome™ App development.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides a basic client with Live Reload compatibility for Chrome™ App Development.

Close your Extensions window for good. When combined with a Live Reload server, Ctrl-S in your text editor is all it takes to run your freshly updated extension. Add a few key lines of javascript to your extension to also reload the webpages you are working on.

See the app homepage on Github for more instructions.
